campaign_brief.sample_headlines: Still Browsing? Your Perfect Pair Awaits + Free Shipping & Returns!
campaign_brief.value_propositions: Reassure hesitant buyers by reminding them of completed actions (quiz, viewed cart) with incentives like free shipping, easy returns, and money-back guarantee. Focus on convenience and minimal risk to finalize the purchase.

strategic_opportunities.success_metrics: Cart Abandonment Recovery Rate +5%, Conversion Rate > 3%

campaign_brief.sample_headlines: Simplify Your Life: Transition Lenses - One Pair, All Conditions!
campaign_brief.value_propositions: Eliminate the hassle of switching between glasses with Transitions lenses. Enjoy clear vision indoors and automatically adapt to sunlight outdoors, all with free shipping, returns, and a money-back guarantee.

strategic_opportunities.success_metrics: CTR > 1.5%, Conversion rate on Transitions lenses > 1.2%, Increase in Transitions lens adoption rate by X%
